thread.title: Manveer Gurjar, Manu Punjabi shoot for new television show | Zee News
thread.title_full: Manveer Gurjar, Manu Punjabi shoot for new television show | Zee News

title: Manveer Gurjar, Manu Punjabi shoot for new television show | Zee News
text:
Manveer Gurjar, Manu Punjabi shoot for new television show By Zee Media Bureau | Last Updated: Sunday, February 12, 2017 - 14:56 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: 'Bigg Boss' season 10 winner Manveer Gurjar and finalist Manu Punjabi will again be putting their best foot forward for a television show. This time, they will be seen in an episode of upcoming comedy show 'Chhote Miyan Dhaakad' Chapter 4. 
Reportedly, their episode has been shot already. In a viral social media image, the duo can be seen sitting along with the judges Sohail Khan and Neha Dhupia. 
See for yourself: 
â€” Manveer Gurjar (@manveergurjarr) February 10, 2017 
The stand-up comedy show 'Chhote Miyan Dhaakad' Chapter 4, which replaces Comedy Nights Bachao Taaza on Colors, sees Neha and the actor turned producer-director Sohail as the judges. It showcases talented kids of age group from 4 to 14 across the country. First Published: Sunday, February 12, 2017 - 14:56 More from zeenews
